Verses: 1 avan Sthaanaththile Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yosabaadh Raajaavaagi, Isravelukku Virodhamaai Balappattaan.
2 avan Yoodhaavin Aranaana Pattanangalilellaam Raanuvaththaiyum, Yoodhaadhesaththilum, Than Thagappanaagiya Aasaa Pidiththa Eppiraayeemin Pattanangalilum Thaanaiyangalaiyum Vaiththaan.
3 karththar Yosabaaththodirundhaar; Avan Paagaalgalaith Thedaamal, Than Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhu Munnaatkalil Nadandha Vazhigalil Nadandhu,
4 than Thagappanudaiya Dhevanaith Thedi, Israveludaiya Seygaiyinpadi Nadavaamal, Avarudaiya Karpanaigalinpadi Nadandhukondaan.

5 aagaiyaal Karththar Avan Kaiyil Raajyabaaraththaith Thidappaduththinaar; Yoodhaa Koththiraththaar Ellaarum Yosabaaththukkuk Kaanikkaigalaik Konduvandhaargal; Avanukku Aisuvariyamum Ganamum Migudhiyaayirundhadhu.
6 karththarudaiya Vazhigalil Avan Irudhayam Urchaagankondadhu; Avan Medaigalaiyum Vikkiragath Thoppugalaiyum Yoodhaavai Vittagatrinaan.
7 avan Arasaanda Moondraam Varushaththil Yoodhaavin Pattanangalile Ubadhesampannumpadikku, Avan Than Prabukkalaagiya Pennaayilaiyum, Opadhiyaavaiyum, Sagariyaavaiyum, Nedhaneyelaiyum, Migaayaavaiyum,

8 ivargalodekooda Semaayaa, Nedhaniyaa, Sepadhiyaa, Aasagel, Semiramodh, Yonaththaan, Adhoniyaa, Thobiyaa, Thopaththoniyaa Ennum Leviyaraiyum, Ivargalodekooda Aasaariyaraana Elishamaavaiyum, Yoraamaiyum Anuppinaan.
9 ivargal Yoodhaavile Ubadhesiththu, Karththarudaiya Vedha Pusthagaththai Vaiththukkondu, Yoodhaavin Pattanangalilellaam Thirindhu Janangalukkuppodhiththaargal.
10 yoodhaavai Sutriyirukkira Dhesangaludaiya Raajyangalinmelellaam Karththaraal Undaana Bayangaram Vandhadhinaal, Yosabaaththodu Yuththampannaadhirundhaargal.

11 pelistharilum Silar Yosabaaththukkup Pagudhippanaththodekoodak Kaanikkaigalaiyum Konduvandhaargal; Arabiyarum Avanukku Ezhaayiraththu Ezhunooru Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Ezhaayiraththuezhunooru Vellaattukkadaakkalaiyum Konduvandhaargal.
12 ippadiye Yosabaadh Varavara Migavum Periyavanaagi, Yoodhaavile Kottaigalaiyum, Rasthukkalai Vaikkum Pattanangalaiyum Kattinaan.
13 yoodhaavin Pattanangalil Avan Periya Velaigalai Nadaththinaan; Erusalemile Paraakkiramasaaligalaana Sevagar Avanukku Irundhaargal.

14 thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsangalinpadi Avargaludaiya Lakkamaavadhu: Yoodhaavile Aayiraththukku Adhipadhigalil Adhnaa Thalaimaiyaanavan; Avanidaththile Paraakkiramasaaligal Moondrulatchamper Irundhaargal.
15 avanukku Udhaviyaaga Yoganaan Ennum Senaapadhiyirundhaan; Avanidaththile Irandulatchaththu Enbadhinaayiram Per Irundhaargal.
16 avanukku Udhaviyaaga Karththarukku Thannai Urchaagamaai Oppukkoduththa Sikriyin Kumaaranaagiya Amasiyaa Irundhaan; Avanidaththile Paraakkiramasaaligal Irandulatchamper Irundhaargal.
17 benyameenile Eliyaadhaa Ennum Paraakkiramasaali Irundhaan; Avanidaththile Villum Kedagamum Pidikkiravargal Irandulatchamper Irundhaargal.
18 avanukku Udhaviyaaga Yosabaadh Irundhaan; Avanidaththile Sevagaththirku Aayudhapaanigal Latchaththu Enbadhinaayiramper Irundhaargal.
19 raajaa Yoodhaa Engumulla Aranaana Pattanangalil Vaiththavargalaiththavira Ivargale Raajaavai Seviththavargal.
